segments.text: Have you ever witnessed any crimes or accidents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't quite remember . Why did you ask that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was taking a walk in the park early this morning when suddenly I heard someone calling " help " . I rushed over and saw a man beating a woman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my . What did you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I was stunned for a moment , then I quickly ran away to get help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Fortunately , I had my cell with me this morning . I called the police as I was running to get people to come to help .
segments.speaker: S1
